SCHtransp:
SCHtransp: boolean
 -----
 Essential mechanism affecting the dynamic behaviour of electrically pumped VCSELs.
Noise:
Noise: boolean
 -----
  The current implementation of noise only works with
 'Finite Diff.' as ODE solver.
nNw:
nNw: int
 -----
 Number of Bessel terms in the carrier radial series expansion of the carrier density Nw in the QWs.
odeSolver:
odeSolver: string
 -----
 Check scipy.integrate.solve_ivp documentation for more details.
 Automatically switches to 'Finite Diff.' if 'Noise' is checked.
tmax:
tmax: float
 -----
 Defined automatically when computing the RIN spectrum or frequency response.
dt:
dt: float
 -----
 This time-step is used to define the parameter teval of solve_ivp, that is,
 it defines the spatial resolution for storing/plotting the results.
dtFD:
dtFD: float
 -----
 Fixed time-step for the Finite Differences solver.
 Generally approximately one order of magnitude smaller than dt.
 Once the computation is complete, the results are subsampled to dt.
modFormat:
modFormat: string
 -----
 'step': turn vcsel on from 0 to Ion.
 'pulse': step up from Ioff (steady-state as starting point) to Ion at t=0,
 and back down to Ioff at t=tmax/2
 'random bits': generate sequence of random bits of duration tb
 between Ioff (steady-state as starting point) and Ion
 'small signal': apply small signal step to steady-state bias current Ion
 to compute the frequency response. Simulation time and
 number of time steps are hard-coded for best results.
 'steady state': no modulation, typically used to visualize noise
 and compute the RIN spectrum.
Ion:
Ion: float
 -----
 'high' current in selected modulation pattern.
Ioff:
Ioff: float
 -----
 'low' current in selected pattern.
Iss:
Iss: float
 -----
 Amplitude of small signal step, must be chosen small enough
 to remain in the VCSEL's linear operations range.
tb:
tb: float
 -----
 Duration of a single on or off signal step.
RINplot:
RIN: boolean
  Switches automatically to the modulation format 'steady state' when selected.
 'Noise' must be selected.
Hfplot:
Hfplot: boolean
  Switches automatically to the modulation format 'small signal' when selected.
 Hidden when 'Noise' is selected.
Eyeplot:
eye: boolean
 Switches automatically to the modulation format 'random bits' when selected.
rox:
rox: float
 -----
 Oxide aperture, proxy to delimit the 'active area' of the cavity.
Leff:
Leff: float
 -----
 Effective cavity length, consisting approximately of the wavelength
 plus the penetration depth into the Distributed Bragg Reflectors (DBR).
nw:
nw: float
 -----
 Number of quantum wells, required to calculate the equivalent active volume.
dw:
dw: float
 -----
 Single quantum well thickness, required to calculate the equivalent active volume.
db:
db: float
 -----
 Barrier thickness (Single Confinement Heterostructure), required to compute transport into the QWs.
GamR:
GamR: float
 -----
 Also referred to as gain enhancement factor.
 Not to be mistaken with the longitudinal confinement factor Gam_z!
tauNb:
tauNb: float
 -----
 Carrier lifetime in the barriers (SCH)
